JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Chefs & Food Lovers: Join the BRUS Kitchen Staff
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
About the job
BRUS kitchen is a part of a Busy Brew Pub environment in Nørrebro. 
Our menu is ever-changing due to seasons and different events.
We find inspiration all over the world and like working with Beer & Fermentation. We work with a Flexible Monthly Schedule with 15 workdays. 

You will be a part of a young, dynamic and large team at BRUS with different nationalities and backgrounds. Where we all are teaming up to push our Kitchen, Bar, Foodbar & Shop into new and exciting directions.

About you
- You have a curious and creative approach to you work.
- You are reliable.- You enjoy working in a busy and ever changing environment
- You can work in a Team, but still be able to get a job done on your own.
- You speak English (basic)

Apply for the job
If you like to hear more or join our Team we'd love to hear about you!
Please read more and send you application via: Positions TO ØL / BRUS
